name: Jigsaw Style Tangram Geometry
description:
Form a given shape without overlapping the pieces! Complete this logic puzzle.

Enjoy creating shapes with the famous puzzle game. Tangram is a worldwide-known game that allows children develop psychomotor and intellectual capacities and introduces concepts of geometry in a playful way.
This game is perfect for all ages. Create puzzles and mosaics using your spatial intelligence !

Move the shape with a blank space to fill all of the empty space defined

- More than 300+ designs different levels.
- 5 Mode Difference Easy, Medium, Tricky, Hard, Expert
- Challenging logic puzzle.
- 6 beautiful relaxing categories to choose from.
- Master mode without full size shape.
- Relaxing logic puzzles that challenge your mind.
- HD graphics that look great.

Tangram is a challenging logic puzzle that stimulates brain activity. It teaches spatial concepts and problem solving. It's great for keeping the mind sharp. It's also a nice free puzzle for all ages.

Tangram puzzle is one of the most popular dissection puzzle in the world. Tangram puzzle game is most entertainment also.

Enjoy the famous Jigsaw Style Tangram shape puzzle fun for all ages.
